articles.title: KKR buyout offer sends Telecom Italia shares surging 30% - CNBC
articles.description: Telecom Italia shares jumped 30% on Monday after U.S. private equity giant KKR launched a 10.8 billion euro buyout bid for Italy's largest phone company.
articles.content:
Telecom Italia shares jumped more than 30% on Monday after U.S. private equity giant KKR launched a 10.8 billion euro ($12 billion) buyout bid for Italy's largest phone company.

articles.title: HMS Host concession workers at Sky Harbor officially on strike - Arizona's Family
articles.description: HMS Host employees took to the picket line at 5 a.m. Monday. That means food options for Thanksgiving travelers will be limited.
